message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you still get a decent cut.
You took the lion's share in round 1, now it's my turn to be the king of the jungle!
Let's find a compromise. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I still need to secure the majority.
You're still holding back, I'll give you a bit more, but I need something substantial in return!
I'm starting to feel the pressure of inflation. I'm willing to offer you a better deal, but I need to secure more than half of the pie to make it worthwhile for me.

I'm starting to feel the pinch of inflation, but I'm still determined to get a fair deal. Let's compromise, I'll give you a larger share, but I need to secure enough to make this worthwhile for me.
It's getting late, and I'm not getting any younger. Let's split it down the middle, it's only fair.
